title: Heavy Rains Hit Karnataka: IMD Issues Orange, Yellow Alerts | Editorji
text:
- IMD issues orange, yellow alerts in Karnataka districts
- Schools, colleges shut in rain-hit Bidar, Dakshina Kannada
- Fishermen warned, public urged to avoid risky travel
